author: kmalhi
msg: Converted the existing test to use the new Validation Test Framework.

author: kmalhi
msg: Added support to run tests which do not want to throw any ValidationFailureException i.e. sometimes you want to test and make sure that there is no validation failure. You can achieve this now by writing a test and annotating it with an empty @Keys.

author: jbellis
msg: extend option to lower compaction priority to hinted handoff as well.  patch by Tyler Hobbs; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-1260

author: dblevins
msg: Patch from Ivan Xu, OPENEJB-1309: Make the DependOn sort algorithm stable
Relates to OPENEJB-1296: Allow @DependsOn usage by all session bean types

author: dblevins
msg: Couple non-passing tests that prove sorting is unstable
